14
15#ifndef IRS_RESCONF_H
16#define IRS_RESCONF_H 1
17
18/*! \file
19 *
20 * \brief
21 * The IRS resconf module parses the legacy "/etc/resolv.conf" file and
22 * creates the corresponding configuration objects for the DNS library
23 * modules.
24 */
25
26#include <irs/types.h>
27
28/*%
29 * A DNS search list specified in the 'domain' or 'search' statements
30 * in the "resolv.conf" file.
31 */
32typedef struct irs_resconf_search {
33 char *domain;
34 ISC_LINK(struct irs_resconf_search) link;
35} irs_resconf_search_t;
36
37typedef ISC_LIST(irs_resconf_search_t) irs_resconf_searchlist_t;
38
39ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
40
41isc_result_t
42irs_resconf_load(isc_mem_t *mctx, const char *filename, irs_resconf_t **confp);
43/*%<
44 * Load the resolver configuration file 'filename' in the "resolv.conf" format,
45 * and create a new irs_resconf_t object from the configuration. If the file
46 * is not found ISC_R_FILENOTFOUND is returned with the structure initialized
47 * as if file contained only:
48 *
49 * nameserver ::1
50 * nameserver 127.0.0.1
51 *
52 * Notes:
53 *
54 *\li Currently, only the following options are supported:
55 * nameserver, domain, search, sortlist, ndots, and options.
56 * In addition, 'sortlist' is not actually effective; it's parsed, but
57 * the application cannot use the configuration.
58 *
59 * Returns:
60 * \li ISC_R_SUCCESS on success
61 * \li ISC_R_FILENOTFOUND if the file was not found. *confp will be valid.
62 * \li other on error.
63 *
64 * Requires:
65 *
66 *\li 'mctx' is a valid memory context.
67 *
68 *\li 'filename' != NULL
69 *
70 *\li 'confp' != NULL && '*confp' == NULL
71 */
72
73void
74irs_resconf_destroy(irs_resconf_t **confp);
75/*%<
76 * Destroy the resconf object.
77 *
78 * Requires:
79 *
80 *\li '*confp' is a valid resconf object.
81 *
82 * Ensures:
83 *
84 *\li *confp == NULL
85 */
86
87isc_sockaddrlist_t *
88irs_resconf_getnameservers(irs_resconf_t *conf);
89/*%<
90 * Return a list of name server addresses stored in 'conf'.
91 *
92 * Requires:
93 *
94 *\li 'conf' is a valid resconf object.
95 */
96
97irs_resconf_searchlist_t *
98irs_resconf_getsearchlist(irs_resconf_t *conf);
99/*%<
100 * Return the search list stored in 'conf'.
101 *
102 * Requires:
103 *
104 *\li 'conf' is a valid resconf object.
105 */
106
107unsigned int
108irs_resconf_getndots(irs_resconf_t *conf);
109/*%<
110 * Return the 'ndots' value stored in 'conf'.
111 *
112 * Requires:
113 *
114 *\li 'conf' is a valid resconf object.
115 */
116
117ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
118
119#endif /* IRS_RESCONF_H */
120
